Welcome to DISTROIâ€™s documentation!#

DISTROI (Disk Inner STructure Reconnaissance through Optical Inteferometry) is a Python package intended to compute optical interferometry (OI) observables from radiative transfer model images and compare them to observations from modern OI observatories (VLTI, CHARA, â€¦). You can consult the DISTROI API below.
